content.value:
I have more stories than I could begin to recount about harrowing interactions with and harassment by men at defcon and Black Hat. 

Including when I was a speaker. Including when I was in modest professional dress. Including in the morning, everyone sober. It’s relentless there.
content.html:
I have more stories than I could begin to recount about harrowing interactions with and harassment by men at defcon and Black Hat. Including when I was a speaker. Including when I was in modest professional dress. Including in the morning, everyone sober. It’s relentless there.
twitter.com/mshannahmurphy…

content.value:
Why #infosecbikini matters:
At 2019 @defcon I went to the bathroom and a woman was weeping. She'd been at a stall trying to crack some cryptogram puzzles and the man in charge told her it'd be complex for her, she should to go to the "babies stall". She had a PhD in cryptography.
content.html: Why #infosecbikini matters: At 2019 @defcon I went to the bathroom and a woman was weeping. She'd been at a stall trying to crack some cryptogram puzzles and the man in charge told her it'd be complex for her, she should to go to the "babies stall". She had a PhD in cryptography.
